todos.description: Start brand new vue CLi project and practice things you read about yesterday, specifically:
bullets: replacing an array in vue data

todos.description: Work out some of the muscles that you haven't yet
Chillax and listen to music, rap some, dance some.
Get healthy food from the store. Chicken breasts for after-workout diet.
He needs some kind of help with computer, when you're free, help him
don't forget to hydrate, it is also important for your workout gains
Wash dishes until you have too much to wash all at once.
Go to store and get a shampoo, and have a bath. It's been a while, dude
Start new vue projects, practice things you haven't had chance to practice before
